China Airlines (Taiwan)/abbr. to 華航|华航[Hua2 hang2]
pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: Now, your project is ready to use the features of CAL.
sentences.chinese: 现在，您的项目准备使用华航的功能。

sentences.english: But joking aside, I'm glad to hear you liked CAL.
sentences.chinese: 不开玩笑了，我很高兴听到您喜欢“华航”。

sentences.english: CAL plane taxiing to the wide runway.
sentences.chinese: 滑行在宽阔跑道上的华航客机。
